DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate efficacy AS1411 patient Metastatic Renal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study AS1411 Renal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Histologically cytologically confirm renal cell carcinoma contain predominant clear cell histology Failed intolerant 1 previous line treatment ( must include Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitor ) Collecting duct histology A history bleed disorder currently take oral vitamin K antagonise medication Unstable brain metastasis History prior concomitant malignancy ( except curatively treat nonmelanoma skin cancer carcinoma situ cervix , cancer patient disease free 3 year )
